raw akas.title: Mi vida con 300 kilos: Cirugía final

akas: Mi vida con 300 kilos: Cirugía final Spain
akas from release info: Mi vida con 300 kilos: Cirugía final Spain

1.title: Stephanie, Darcy & BJ
1.plot: Stephanie and her mom Darcy lost a combined weight of 320lbs and hope to both be approved for life changing skin removal surgery. BJ overcame drug and food addiction to lose a staggering 350lbs only to be left with his body covered in loose excess skin.

2.title: Antonia & Natasha
2.plot: Antonia took control of her battle with food addiction to lose 190lbs, but the extra skin is keeping her from feeling confident and sexy. Natasha lost almost 300lbs after gastric bypass surgery, but now struggles with carrying a lot of saggy excess skin.

3.title: Angel & Linda
3.plot: Linda is hoping skin removal surgery will give her the self-esteem she needs to be an amazing role model to her daughters. Angel hates her extra skin because it's turning her into an introvert around her family but hopes surgery will boost her confidence.

4.title: Shantel & Hope
4.plot: Shantel needs to get rid of her excess skin to gain the confidence she needs to set a positive example for her daughter. Hope, once over 300lbs, has an obsession with weight loss that could make her too unhealthy to have skin removal surgery.

5.title: Melanie & Lauren
5.plot: After losing 350lbs, Melanie wants to just feel normal and date but her layers of skin are dragging her down. Lauren, once over 400lbs and now 158lbs, is so uncomfortable in her excess skin that she can't have the normal life she wants with her boyfriend.

6.title: Nikki & Denise
6.plot: After losing 275lbs, Mikki became a fitness fanatic, but the weight loss left her with a lot of sagging skin. Denise's obesity always made her feel invisible, but after losing 200lbs the skin still hinders her from fitting in with her outgoing family.

7.title: Sal & Rebecca
7.plot: Rebecca lost her weight to be more active with her young son, but the plan backfired because she's now trapped in her excess skin. After his dad died, Sal dropped a ton of weight, but with all the excess skin, he fears he will never become a dad.

8.title: Autumn & Cody
8.plot: Autumn wants to make up for lost time with her only son, but the excess skin from major weight loss is holding her back. Cody always pretended to be happy when he was 500-lbs, but after losing the weight, he's covered in skin and is sick of pretending.

9.title: Ronnie, Michael, & Renee
9.plot: Sweet couple Ronnie and Michael Robinette are thriving to live the life they've work so hard for, but their extra skin is in their way. At 64, Renee's excess skin inhibits her from enjoying her relationship and expressing her true self in public.

10.title: Tamils & Emily, Jose
10.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

11.title: Marranda & Jannet
11.plot: After being a victim of a horrible crime, Marranda found solace in food and her weight ballooned. She lost the weight, but the skin is a cruel reminder of her trauma. Jannet's excess skin is keeping her from meeting a life partner.

12.title: Rafael & Anna
12.plot: Rafael lost over 500-lbs through diet and exercise, but now his excess skin is a huge hindrance on his life and progress. Anna lost 330-lbs, but her low self-esteem is holding her back from being the mother she wants to be. Can skin removal surgery help?

13.title: Carlynda & Karen
13.plot: Carlynda needs two full knee replacements but doctors won't perform surgery until the skin is gone. After extreme weight loss, and marrying the love of her life, Karen is ready start a family but her excess skin is in her way.

1.title: Lauana and Tim
1.plot: Lauana lost 170-lbs to find her tiny frame still swamped by excess skin. After losing over 200-lbs, Tim's skin still gets in the way of being a great dad. Through surgical skin removal, both are given a full body transformation to reveal their new bodies.

2.title: Megan and Yalena
2.plot: Megan lost 225lbs but now hides 50lbs of skin under her clothes, leaving her physically and mentally trapped. Yalena's extreme weightloss counts for nothing unless she sheds her excess skin. Skin surgery is the only way to complete their transformations.

3.title: Melissa and Jeff
3.plot: Melissa lost 235 lbs but her confidence is still at an all time low due due to her massive amount of excess skin. Jeff has lost 300 lbs but continues to hide himself from the world. Their dreams of normalcy rest on life-changing skin removal surgery.

4.title: Lindsey and Derek
4.plot: Lindsey lost 140lbs, her excess skin keeps her goal of an athletic body out of reach. Derek lost 200lbs his excess skin hinders his training to pass the Police Academy physical. Both are given full body surgical transformations to reveal their new bodies.

5.title: Brian and Tanya
5.plot: Brian once weighed over 600-lbs but lost nearly 400-lbs and now has majorly sagging skin. Tanya lost nearly 200-lbs and her excess skin drapes over her new frame. To take control of their lives Brian and Tanya undergo life-changing skin removal surgery.

6.title: Ariel and Chantae
6.plot: Ariel is just 23, but already lost a huge 260-lbs. She now finds the excess skin even more unfeminine than being obese. Spirited Chantae is desperate to enjoy life again after losing 222-lbs. Skin removal is the only way to complete their transformations.

7.title: Cutting Deep
7.plot: Twelve Americans take the final step in their weight-loss journey. See the results of 350-lbs of surgical skin removals and nearly 3,000-lbs of weight-loss with inspirational transformations, never before seen moments and dramatic updates.

1.title: Julie N. & Andrew
1.plot: Julie lost 178-lbs, but now her globs of excess skin, cause her to recoil from even the touch of her children. Andrew shed 300-lbs spending every spare moment in the gym and is now engulfed in empty skin that's killing his dream of body-building.

2.title: Megan & Ashley
2.plot: Megan lost 225lbs but now hides 50lbs of skin under her clothes, leaving her physically and mentally trapped. Yalena's extreme weightloss counts for nothing unless she sheds her excess skin. Skin surgery is the only way to complete their transformations.

3.title: Holly & Mark
3.plot: After losing 200 pounds Holly's loose skin keeps her from setting a wedding date. After losing 250 pounds Mark's loose skin keeps him from being intimate with his wife. They visit plastic surgeons to review their options.

4.title: Brenda & Melissa M.
4.plot: Brenda lost 260-lbs, but her excess skin is forcing her to lose her marriage. Mellisa's past relationship with food landed her at 307-lbs, but her 180-lb weight loss left her with loose skin which is affecting her relationship with her daughters.

5.title: Jeanne & Julie M.
5.plot: After her husband suddenly passed away, Jenae reached 512-lbs, but now her excess skin hides her dramatic weight loss. Even though Julie lost 191-lbs, her excess skin is a constant reminder her of her obesity and how it damaged her marriage.

6.title: Kylie & Anna
6.plot: Kylie, who reached 321-lbs by age 18, had a weight loss surgery leaving her with a life-threatening infection. Now she's 21 and 150-lbs lighter, but she's covered in excess skin. Anna lost 250-lbs, but fears her extra skin makes her look unprofessional.

7.title: Sarah & Roger
7.plot: Sarah turned to food for comfort during her damaging childhood, but her 220-lb weight loss left her with painful sagging skin. At 500-lbs, Roger overcame a challenging life to raise his children but his 300-lb weight loss gave him restricting excess skin.

8.title: Annette & Calisto
8.plot: Annette, who was once 650-lbs, lost over half of her body weight, but her excess skin is a painful reminder of years of an overeating addiction. Callisto lost 250-lbs and became a model but the shame of her loose skin put her passion and marriage on hold.

9.title: Mary & Lora
9.plot: Mary lost 161-lbs and hopes skin removal surgery will rid her of the painful memories of her once obese life. After a car accident, Lora went through recovery, obesity, and gastric bypass surgery, but is now left with stretched skin and terrible scars.

10.title: Melissa & Jessica & Matt
10.plot: Sisters, Jessica & Melissa are left with massive excess hanging skin after growing up morbidly obese. Matt lost everything he cherished from being over 625-lbs, but after losing a lot of the weight, his excess skin is keeping him from returning to life.

11.title: Episode #2.11
11.plot: Part 1 check-in with some of our Season 2 formerly obese individuals that have undergone agonizing surgeries to remove over 100-lbs of excess skin. Now they must weather the highs and lows of their inspiring, and often unpredictable body transformations.

-1.title: Lindsey Adams
-1.plot:

imdb.plot outline: Skin Tight follows the stories of people who have lost massive amounts of weight and are about to undergo skin removal surgery. With cutting edge expertise and reconstructive surgical talent, surgeons will cut away massive amounts of skin, creating a full-body transformation. The reveal will not only change each subject's self-image but will change their life.
imdb.title: Skin Tight
plot: _Skin Tight_ (qv) follows the stories of people who have lost massive amounts of weight and are about to undergo skin removal surgery. With cutting edge expertise and reconstructive surgical talent, surgeons will cut away massive amounts of skin, creating a full-body transformation. The reveal will not only change each subject's self-image but will change their life.
